description:
Adulocia is the guardian of the Seal of Water in the Thoda Geyser, and the third and final guardian the http://anidb.net/ch11679 [Chosen] faces on her Journey of Regeneration.
In the game, this is the 2nd guardian, followed by the Seal of Wind and the Seal of Light. The Seal of Light was not included in the anime.
name: Nodis
